Real Name: Johnny Storm
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
LOOK PAST YOUR CLOAKING DEVICES: Opposing characters within 6 squares can't use Stealth.
DO NOT MAKE ME GO ALL COSMIC ON YOU, MAN: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses. When Invisible Boy uses Super Senses and succeeds, after resolutions deal the attacker 1 penetrating damage.

February 11, 2021
Goop
He is going to be very hard to hit with Super Senses, ESD and Invincible none of which you can outwit because of his TA. Still, he just doesn't offer much offense other than stealth busting, doesn't even have stealth himself. There are better options for 100pts. Good sideline piece though that can be swapped in against all stealth teams.
